extensions.task:
Displays the sub-projects of root project 'Toro'.

Task group: help

Creates a version of android.jar that's suitable for unit tests.

Task group: build

Runs all device checks using Device Providers and Test Servers.

Task group: verification

Runs lint on all variants.

Task group: verification

Generates Crashlytics symbol files for NDK projects.

Task group: other

Deletes the build cache directory.

Task group: build

Uploads stored deobfuscation files to Crashlytics.

Task group: other

Installs the Prerelease build.

Task group: Install

Displays the components produced by root project 'Toro'. [incubating]

Task group: help

Uninstalls the Release build.

Task group: Install

Installs and runs instrumentation tests using all Device Providers.

Task group: verification

Injects the build id used by the Fabric SDK.

Task group: other

Uninstalls the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Assembles all variants of all applications and secondary packages.

Task group: build

Caches generated Crashlytics symbol files for upload.

Task group: other

Installs the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Runs all device checks on currently connected devices.

Task group: verification

Installs and runs the tests for debug on connected devices.

Task group: verification

Assembles all the Test applications.

Task group: build

Extracts Android annotations for the release variant into the archive file

Task group: build

Injects the build id used by the Fabric SDK.

Task group: other

Generates Crashlytics symbol files for NDK projects.

Task group: other

Outputs dex method count for prerelease.

Task group: Reporting

Run unit tests for all variants.

Task group: verification

Outputs dex method count for debug.

Task group: Reporting

Run unit tests for the debug build.

Task group: verification

Installs the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Injects the build id used by the Fabric SDK.

Task group: other

Generates IDEA project file (IPR)

Task group: other

Runs lint on the Release build.

Task group: verification

Generates IDEA project files (IML, IPR, IWS)

Task group: IDE

Displays the dependent components of components in root project 'Toro'. [incubating]

Task group: help

Displays all buildscript dependencies declared in root project 'Toro'.

Task group: help

Prints out all the source sets defined in this project.

Task group: Android

Cleans IDEA project files (IML, IPR)

Task group: IDE

Runs lint on just the fatal issues in the release build.

Task group: other

Crashlytics target to be invoked after completing release builds. Cleans up Crashlytics-generated resource files. Caches and uploads deobfuscation files to Crashlytics servers.

Task group: other

Uninstalls the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Uploads cached Crashlytics symbol files to Crashlytics.

Task group: other

Uploads an APK to Crashlytics for distribution.

Task group: other

Outputs dex method count for release.

Task group: Reporting

Assembles all Release builds.

Task group: build

Uploads all artifacts belonging to configuration ':toro:archives'

Task group: upload

Uploads an APK to Crashlytics for distribution.

Task group: other

Assembles a bundle containing the library in debug.

Task group: other

Runs lint on the Debug build.

Task group: verification

Assembles a bundle containing the library in release.

Task group: other

Displays the configuration model of root project 'Toro'. [incubating]

Task group: help

Displays the tasks runnable from root project 'Toro' (some of the displayed tasks may belong to subprojects).

Task group: help

Initializes a new Gradle build. [incubating]

Task group: Build Setup

Displays all dependencies declared in root project 'Toro'.

Task group: help

Installs the 'archives' artifacts into the local Maven repository.

Task group: other

Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

Run unit tests for the release build.

Task group: verification

Assembles all Debug builds.

Task group: build

Extracts Android annotations for the debug variant into the archive file

Uploads cached Crashlytics symbol files to Crashlytics.

Displays a help message.

Installs the Release build.

Task group: Install

Publishes artifacts to bintray.com.

Uploads cached Crashlytics symbol files to Crashlytics.

Caches generated Crashlytics symbol files for upload.

Uploads an APK to Crashlytics for distribution.

Installs and runs instrumentation tests for all flavors on connected devices.
